text:
Improbable, London : Onsite : www.improbable.io : Salaries at top-end UK market (vary per role) - inc Equity.

We are creating SpatialOS, a distributed, cloud-agnostic OS that facilitates simulation on an unprecedented scale, allowing us to ask huge, "what if" questions of the real world.

It's a huge undertaking, it's massively ambitious, it's something we're all proud to be part of.

We recently worked with the UK govt to simulate the backbone of the internet seen here: http://improbable.io/2016/03/24/what-we-found-when-we-simula...

Looking for:

# PRODUCT MANAGERS # SENIOR SOFTWARE ENGINEERS # QA LEAD # ENGINEERING MANAGERS # SECURITY ENGINEERS # Everybody else who's interested in what we're doing.

www.improbable.io/careers for all roles. You can email us directly at recruitment@improbable.io
